message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $2000000. It's a unique opportunity with significant potential value.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. However, I am only able to commit up to $1800000 for this item. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping for a bit closer to my initial price.  Would you be willing to go up to $1900000?  I think it's a fair price considering the value of this product.

Alice, thank you for your follow-up offer. I understand the value of the product, but I must stick to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $1850000. This is the highest I can go while still making sure I can allocate funds elsewhere.
